mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_verification_codes (id, email, code, purpose, used, expire_time, created_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{email}, #{code}, #{purpose,typeHandler=com.llmctl.config.PurposeTypeHandler}, #{used}, #{expireTime}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM email_verification_codes WHERE expire_time < NOW() OR used = TRUE
